meanings.definition: A small, dark spot on the skin caused by a clogged hair follicle.
meanings.sent1: I noticed a few blackheads on my nose.
meanings.sent2: She used a special tool to extract the blackheads from her face.
meanings.sent3: The blackheads on his cheek looked like tiny dots of ink.
meanings.sent4: Her face was dotted with blackheads, like a starry night sky.
meanings.sent5: The blackheads stood out against her pale skin like little shadows.

meanings.definition: To remove blackheads from the skin.
meanings.sent1: I need to blackheads from my face before the party.
meanings.sent2: She blackheads carefully to avoid any scarring.
meanings.sent3: He blackheads with such focus, it was almost like a form of meditation.
meanings.sent4: Removing blackheads felt like uncovering hidden treasures on her skin.
meanings.sent5: The process of blackheads can be satisfying yet tedious.
